summary: high quality textures replacement for fur armor set
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=green][size=5][b]Hi-Res texture replacer for the fur set[/b][/size][/color]


[b][size=4]aMidianBorn Retexture Pack >>> [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24909]Book of Silence[/url] <<<[/size][/b][/center]


[size=3][b][color=green]Distribution permission[/color][/b]: This file is a [b]Nexus-exclusive release[/b], please respect my decision and DO NOT reupload it elsewhere... I did not give, or want to give permission for any kind of reupload.[/size]

[size=3] °°° HD texture replacer for fur armor

°°° same resolution as official hi-res dlc-textures

°°° as usual, everything has been redone from scratch

°°° this work should be compatible with anything including remodeled mesh (for various body-replacers) and mods using parts of fur set

°°° [b]INSTALLATION[/b]: just drop the "textures-folder" inside your data-folder or use the mod manager.
